gold.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 35% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

gold.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

gold.desc: Gain a Guardian Emblem and a Zac.

gold.name: Hot Shot
gold.desc: Cannoneer's cannon shots burn their targets, dealing 8% of the target's maximum Health as true damage over 2 seconds, and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn. Gain a Tristana.

gold.desc: If you have less than 20 gold at the end of a round, gain 2 gold.

gold.name: Jeweled Lotus
gold.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 25% Critical Strike Chance.

gold.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 4 times.

prismatic.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

prismatic.name: BattlemageIII
prismatic.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

prismatic.name: Knife's Edge III
prismatic.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 40 Attack Damage.

prismatic.name: Dragon Soul
prismatic.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Dragon. Gain a Zippy and a Gargoyle Stoneplate.
